[[Version 3.0]]
* The 4-Piece Bonus of Crimson Witch of Flames was updated:
** {{Color|Old effect}}: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.
** {{Color|New effect}}: Increases Overloaded and Burning, {{Highlight|and Burgeon}} DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.
